content:
There are three meetings this week on AI/ML for Math/Theorem Proving:

  • AITP 2024
    • Lean Zulip discussion: #Machine Learning for Theorem Proving > AITP 2024
  • AI for Mathematics Workshop on Lean, Automated Reasoning and Beyond
    • Lean Zulip announcement: #announce > AI for Mathematics Workshop on Lean, Sep. 2-6, Beijing
    • Lean Zulip discussion: #general > AI for Mathematics Workshop on Lean, Sep. 2-6, Beijing (d...
  • Mathematics and Machine Learning - Opening Workshop
    • Part of a larger semester at Harvard on Mathematics and Machine Learning
    • They have their own Zulip for discussions: mml2024.zulipchat.com
